name: Patrick Ortiz
profile: Innovative and highly detailed software developer, with broad knowledge and hands-on experience designing, developing, and enhancing web applications. Able to apply advanced technical expertise to improve operations, streamline procedures, and produce a powerful Internet presence. Personable individual, with a capacity to work well independently or with diverse teams. Flexible, patient, and dedicated to meeting company needs, and exceeding expectations.

experience.title: Software Development Engineer 3, Scrum Master, Team Lead
responsibilities: Served as Scrum Master, ensuring that project processes were observed and ensured that Scrum Teams were giving all opportunities to succeed.
Acted as team lead, specifically with regards to User Interface development and design. This meant ensuring that standards in coding practices were observed and integrated.
Served as Technical Release Manager in charge of ensuring code is packaged and recorded prior to release into test and production environments.
Built and maintained the UI for the Lulu eCommerce system which included the Shopping Cart and entire Checkout flow.

Developed and maintained a content management system for use by the Marketing teams using the Joomla! CMS and PHP. This included the addition of content migration features, templating, language selection and traffic routing built with the Joomla! API. In addition, built and maintained a SilverStripe CMS instance as well for LuluJr.
Created HTML, OmniGraffle, and Photoshop mockups for user interfaces.

experience.title: Associate Software Development Engineer
responsibilities: Maintained and developed front end product solutions using Freemarker templates, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and MSSQL.
Created HTML mockups for web-based user interfaces using industry standard coding practices in HTML, JavaScript, and CSS.
Maintained a presence as the "go-to guy" for all related web development questions as it applied to the above standards and compliance.

experience.title: IT Specialist / Web Development
responsibilities: Created web applications using PHP, PERL, CSS, HTML, and JavaScript that outline client needs.
Bridged MySQL, Postgres, Oracle, and MSSQL databases using PHP and Perl.
Maintained code and database applications run on Apache Web Server.

experience.title: Support Staff
responsibilities: Provide support with company documents by creating digital representations of paperwork.

experience.title: IT Specialist / Web Development
responsibilities: Developed module based code for the company web site using PHP, MySQL, CSS, HTML, and JavaScript.
Supported and maintained a basic Apache Web Server configuration for the company intra-net.
Supported and maintained the company in-house software.
Provided phone and technical support for field personnel.
Designed and implemented logistical plans to provide field personnel with supplies and equipment.

experience.title: Pharmacy Technician
responsibilities: Performed the full range of financial and inventory transactions.
Accurately filled customer prescriptions ensuring quality.
Displayed initiative by serving in management role on a part-time basis.

education.title: Web Development and Business Programming
education.school_name: The Chubb Institute of Cherry Hill
skills: Created practical, customized business solutions in Java and Visual Basic.
Obtained a solid skill-set in the design of new programs and algorithms.
Achieved a qualified education in a wide range of technical systems, tools, methodologies, and languages.
